name: SagCAD
description: Easy to use 2D Computer Aided Drafting and Modelling application with the following features: * 2D CAD * Opening/Saving/Creating of files * Undo/Redo * Font use Qcad cxf Font * Cut/Copy/Paste * SGY/DXF/IGES/NC output * SGY/DXF/NC input * ps(PostScript) file output * CAM * Ellipse and polyline
